display_long_description:
WebXR Animations and Games.

Animations with the Roller Coaster.
Shooting Games with the Roller Coaster.

Play to kill monsters and free rooms and spaces.
Do sports while playing, while watching animations or while listening to music.

Many Background Images.
Many Dynamic Effects.
Gamepad Support.
Controller Support.
3D Positional Audio.

For PC, Mixed Reality Headsets, Tablets and Smartphones.
A-Frame / WebXR (VR / AR).

Other Features:
Video Input.
mp4 / webm.
m3u8 (hls) / mpd (dash).
IPTV Player and Public Links.
Webradio Player and Public Links.
Customized Links.

You can:
- Stay in 2D with Webview and restricted parameters.
- Send links and launch the native Meta Quest browser, go to a full immersive mode, or go to a full immersive mode with a large virtual screen.

New (10.2.00): Maps Embed.
With the Maps Embed, it is possible to display maps and images, and play the "Free the Background" game by selecting the game mode.
